story.text: Steve Lee is a developer with some experience on, (erhmm, cough), Microsoft tools and platforms, a bit of real-time/embedded/communications and a bit of config. management.

He currently works for Digita ([http://digita.com digita.com]) in the UK, developing Tax and Financial programs, a bit of development on one of the the above-mentioned big-ish company's personal finance products and has done some stuff used by the Inland Revenue.
If you must see a picture see [http://www.fullmeasure.co.uk/home.html www.fullmeasure.co.uk] (warning some may find this offensive!).
